task.title: Create Agents on QueueMetrics
task.shortdesc: You need to tell QueueMetrics on which queues our agents will be working. The agents should be configured according to the extensions on your PBX.

step.cmd: On the QueueMetrics Home page, click Edit agents.
Configure the Agent Detail according to the extension settings on your PBC.
step.info: Set the following parameters and leave all other parameters blank.

choices.choice: Asterisk agent code: The format is Agent/xxxx. For example, the agent’s extension number is 1000, the Asterisk agent code should be Agent/1000.
Agent description: Enter the agent's name.
Current terminal: Enter the agent’s extension number.
